sentences.en: A 4 - speed automatic transmission is optional.
sentences.cn: 四 段自动 变速器是可自由选择的.

sentences.en: A holiday isn't an optional extra. In this stressful, frantic world it's a must.
sentences.cn: 休假并非可有可无。在这个紧张而忙碌的世界，它是必不可少的。

sentences.en: Apart from the compulsory exercises , there are also voluntary or optional exercises.
sentences.cn: 除了规定动作外, 还有自选动作.

sentences.en: Appends the specified element of List ( optional operation ).
sentences.cn: 在列表尾部添加指定元素 ( 可选操作 ).

sentences.en: Attendance at the lecture is optional.
Certain courses are compulsory, others are optional.
sentences.cn: 某些课程是必修的，其他是选修的。

sentences.en: Optional flags which describe how the format string is to be interpreted.
sentences.cn: 可选的标签,用于指示格式化字符被如何解释.

sentences.en: San Francisco Bay Cruise, Hearst Castle Car admission is optional.
sentences.cn: 湾区游轮 、 赫氏古堡及电缆车门票.

sentences.en: Sex education is a sensitive area for some parents, and thus it should remain optional.
sentences.cn: 性教育对某些家长而言是个敏感领域，因此应该保持其非强制性。

sentences.en: So far, the optional course has a history of 200 years.
sentences.cn: 选修课从产生到现在已经经历了近200年的历史.

sentences.en: The course consists of ten core modules and five optional modules.
sentences.cn: 这门课程包括十个必修单元和五个选修单元。

sentences.en: The course consists of ten core modules and five optional modules.
sentences.cn: 这门课程包括十个必修单元和五个选修单元。
其他的短途旅行是自选项目。

sentences.en: Under some constraint conditions, a procedure to get the optional position of connected objects.
sentences.cn: 在某些约束条件下, 获得相连物体最佳位置的过程.

sentences.en: We also recommend a full day optional excursion to the Upper Douro.
sentences.cn: 我们还推荐去杜罗河上游的短途自选一日游。

words.tran_cn: [计] 选项；选择权；买卖的特权

trans.tran_en: if something is optional, you do not have to do it or use it, but you can choose to if you want to
